Package clock

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PriorityQueue<T>
    Definition of the Priority Queue abstract data type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutClock
    this class will open the about window and display the below message to the user
    AddAlarm
    This Class will take open the add alarm screen - and pass the information across to the priority queue
    AlarmListner
    This class created the action listener for the alarm at the head of the priority queue
    Clock
    Main programme
    ClockPanel
    Class to load the clock face
    Controller
    Timer for the update the clock face - will call an another class to do the actual update
    DeleteHead
    will will delete the head of the queue -
    EditAlarmQueue  
    EditAlarmWindow
    Loads the edit alarms screen- edit alarms does not work just yet - needed to create another function within priority queue to do this rather than just delete the head
    Model
    will update the hours a min - linked to controller
    Person
    Minimal "person" class.
    PriorityItem<T>
    A wrapper for bundling up an item and its integer priority.
    SetAlarmHandler
    Think this was a text screen and no longer called
    SortedArrayPriorityQueue<T>
    Implementation of the PriorityQueue ADT using a sorted array for storage.
    View
    this will load the initial interface - some of the action listeners are also build into here
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QueueOverflowException
    Queue is full.
    QueueUnderflowException
    Queue is empty.
